Description.Text:
Property Location
Chelsea Cloisters is in the heart of London, walking distance from Brompton Oratory and Victoria and Albert Museum. This apartment is close to Harrods and Imperial College London.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 250 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as microwaves and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the apartment's 2 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Satisfy your appetite at one of the apartment's 2 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Conveniences include phones, as well as microwaves and coffee/tea makers.

Chelsea Cloisters is in the heart of London, walking distance from Brompton Oratory and Victoria and Albert Museum. This apartment is close to Harrods and Imperial College London.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Brompton Oratory - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Victoria and Albert Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Beauchamp Place - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Saatchi Gallery - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Sloane Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
London Science Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
London Natural History Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Harrods - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Royal Hospital Chelsea - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Imperial College London - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Royal Albert Hall - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Albert Memorial - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Battersea Park - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Hyde Park Corner - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Chelsea Bridge - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 19.7 km / 12.3 mi

The preferred airport for Chelsea Cloisters is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
